title: Man Getting Haircut

nouns: The way someone's hair is cut.
The style in which hair has been cut
Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.

apple_vendor_description: This emoji on Apple devices depicts a man with a calm, neutral expression, his head tilted slightly as if receiving a service. The rendering showcases Apple's signature attention to detail, with realistic hair strands and subtle shadows that give depth to the scene. The haircutting scissors are depicted with a polished silver finish, symbolizing transformation, rejuvenation, or a fresh start in personal style.
